alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 5:56PM EDT until May 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Western Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northeastern Estill County in east central Kentucky... Western Menifee County in east central Kentucky... North central Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sideview to near Westbend to Shade, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Camargo around 605 PM EDT. Jeffersonville around 610 PM EDT. Zachariah around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Reynoldsville and Pine Ridge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Lee; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Wolfe
